name: lumene-app
description: A Tauri app wrapping your existing application

scripts.tauri:build:fixed: tauri build && cd src-tauri && powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File windows/patch-installer-fixed.ps1 && cd .. && npm run tauri:build
scripts.tauri:build:exe: tauri build && cd src-tauri && powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File windows/patch-installer-fixed.ps1 && cd .. && npm run tauri:build
scripts.tauri:build:clean: cd src-tauri && cargo clean && cd .. && npm run tauri:build:fixed
